title: The Art of Conversation with Adrian Villar Rojas in Singapore
body:
Award-winning Argentine artist Adrian Villar Rojas joined the first ever Deutsche Bank x Frieze "Art of Conversation" event in Asia at the landmark National Gallery Singapore.
Recognised for his fantastical large-scale sculptures, Rojas's work is exhibited across the globe, from the Louvre to MoMA. Deutsche Bank has three pieces in its art collection.
Celebrating Deutsche Bank’s 20th anniversary as global lead partner with Frieze, the “Art of Conversation” series is a valuable platform to connect clients with artists, other collectors, and leading art institutions.
Frieze’s Asia fair featured over 120 art galleries from across Asia and beyond, with a primary focus on contemporary art, supplemented by a Frieze Masters section dedicated to art from antiquity through to the 20th century.
